value.stringValue: Update Next Activity Date on Hotlist
Update Next Activity Date on Hotlist

rules.name: myRule_4
rules.label: New Task Types for Hot List

Flow.description: All encompassing PB for triggering on the activity object

value.stringValue:
BEGINS([Task].WhatId, 'a3N') && ISPICKVAL( [Task].Hot_List_Type__c , '' ) && ISCHANGED ( [Task].ActivityDate )
||
ISNEW() && BEGINS([Task].WhatId, 'a3N') && ISPICKVAL( [Task].Hot_List_Type__c , '' ) && NOT (ISBLANK( [Task].ActivityDate ))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_12
formulas.expression:
BEGINS({!myVariable_current.WhatId}, 'a3N') && ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Hot_List_Type__c} , '' ) && ISCHANGED ( {!myVariable_current.ActivityDate} )
||
ISNEW() && BEGINS({!myVariable_current.WhatId}, 'a3N') && ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Hot_List_Type__c} , '' ) && NOT (ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.ActivityDate} ))

value.stringValue:
BEGINS([Task].WhatId, 'a3N') && ISPICKVAL( [Task].Hot_List_Type__c , '' ) && ISCHANGED ( [Task].ActivityDate )
||
ISNEW() && BEGINS([Task].WhatId, 'a3N') && ISPICKVAL( [Task].Hot_List_Type__c , '' ) && NOT (ISBLANK( [Task].ActivityDate ))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_12_pmetrule
formulas.expression:
BEGINS({!myVariable_old.WhatId}, 'a3N') && ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_old.Hot_List_Type__c} , '' ) && ISCHANGED ( {!myVariable_old.ActivityDate} )
||
ISNEW() && BEGINS({!myVariable_old.WhatId}, 'a3N') && ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_old.Hot_List_Type__c} , '' ) && NOT (ISBLANK( {!myVariable_old.ActivityDate} ))

value.stringValue: OR ( AND ( ISNEW(), OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL([Task].Hot_List_Source__c, '')), BEGINS([Task].CreatedBy.Username , 'marketo') ), OR ( BEGINS([Task].WhoId, '003'), BEGINS([Task].WhoId, '00Q'), BEGINS([Task].WhatId, '006'), BEGINS([Task].WhatId, '500') ) ), AND(ISCHANGED([Task].MRKO_Alignment_Run__c ), NOT([Task].IsClosed)) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_4
formulas.expression: OR ( AND ( ISNEW(), OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Hot_List_Source__c}, '')), BEGINS({!myVariable_current.CreatedBy.Username} , 'marketo') ), OR ( BEGINS({!myVariable_current.WhoId}, '003'), BEGINS({!myVariable_current.WhoId}, '00Q'), BEGINS({!myVariable_current.WhatId}, '006'), BEGINS({!myVariable_current.WhatId}, '500') ) ), AND(ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.MRKO_Alignment_Run__c} ), NOT({!myVariable_current.IsClosed})) )

Flow.label: Activity Management - Create/Edit
